item.title: 据彭博新闻社报道，必和必拓再次向英美资源集团提出竞购要求
item.description: 据彭博新闻社周日报道，矿业集团必和必拓集团（BHP Group）再次向竞争对手英美资源集团（Anglo American）提出收购。【原文：Mining group BHP Group has made a renewed takeover approach to rival Anglo American , Bloomberg News reported on Sunday.】

item.title: 人工智能和降息疑虑重重，投资者关注假日季动荡
item.description: 由于美联储近期降息的不确定性，以及对人工智能公司估值过高的担忧日益加剧，股市投资者正准备迎接动荡的年末。【原文：Stock market investors are preparing for a turbulent year-end sparked by uncertainty over near-term Federal Reserve interest rate cuts and mounting worries that artificial intelligence companies, which have propelled the market to new records this year, are overvalued.】

item.title: 南非认为尽管二十国集团存在分歧，但美国贸易谈判仍将继续
item.description: 南非贸易部长帕克斯-陶周日表示，尽管两国在本周末约翰内斯堡举行的20国集团峰会上存在分歧，但他预计与美国的贸易协议谈判仍将继续。【原文：South Africa's trade minister Parks Tau said on Sunday that he expected negotiations with the U.S. over a trade deal would continue, despite differences between the two countries over this weekend's Group of 20 summit in Johannesburg.】

item.title: 加拿大表示将在 "适当的时候 "恢复与美国的贸易谈判
item.description: 加拿大总理马克-卡尼（Mark Carney）周日表示，加拿大将在 "适当的时候 "恢复与美国的贸易讨论，并指出他与美国总统唐纳德-特朗普之间没有迫切的问题需要解决。【原文：Canada will resume trade discussions with the United States "when it's appropriate," Canadian Prime Minister Mark Carney said on Sunday, noting he did not have a pressing issue to address with President Donald Trump.】

item.title: 报告：摩根大通和花旗等大型银行在黑客攻击后发出数据泄露警告
item.description: 据《纽约时报》周六报道，房地产贷款公司技术供应商 SitusAMC 周六表示，该公司在 11 月 12 日遭到了网络攻击。【原文：SitusAMC, a technology vendor for real estate lenders said on Saturday that it had been the subject of a cyberattack on November 12, the New York Times reported on Saturday.】

item.title: 美国法院文件指控 Meta 公司掩盖了社交媒体危害的 "因果 "证据
item.description: Meta 公司没有公布研究结果或进行更多的研究，而是叫停了进一步的工作，并在内部宣布，负面研究结果受到了围绕该公司的 "现有媒体报道 "的玷污。【原文：Rather than publishing the findings or pursuing additional research, Meta called off further work and internally declared that the negative study findings were tainted by the “existing media narrative” around the company, the filing states.】

item.title: 沃尔玛首次亮相非洲，在南非开设分店
item.description: 周六，沃尔玛在南非开设了第一家门店，这标志着这家美国零售巨头在非洲大陆的首次亮相，因为它要在这个竞争激烈的市场中占据一席之地。【原文：Walmart opened its first store in South Africa on Saturday, marking the U.S. retail giant’s debut on the African continent as it seeks a stake in a competitive market.】

item.title: 瑞士经济部长表示，美国对瑞士的关税下调至 15%，可能于 12 月初生效
item.description: 瑞士经济部长居伊-帕尔梅林（Guy Parmelin）在周六接受 SRF 广播公司采访时表示，美国对从瑞士进口商品征收的 39% 的总关税可能从 12 月初起降至 15%。【原文：The United States' general tariff of 39% on imports from Switzerland could be cut to 15% from early December, Swiss Economy Minister Guy Parmelin told the broadcaster SRF in an interview aired on Saturday.】

item.title: 美联储主席柯林斯货币政策目前位置正确，对降息犹豫不决
item.description: 波士顿联邦储备银行行长苏珊-柯林斯（Susan Collins）周六表示，她仍倾向于反对美国央行在下个月下调利率目标，因为美国央行在通胀和就业方面都面临着持续的风险。【原文：Federal Reserve Bank of Boston President Susan Collins said Saturday that she’s still leaning against the U.S. central bank cutting its interest rate target next month as it faces ongoing risks to both its inflation and job mandates.】

item.title: 阿联酋宣布耗资 10 亿美元在非洲推广人工智能的倡议
item.description: 阿拉伯联合酋长国周六表示，它将投资 10 亿美元在非洲各地扩展人工智能基础设施和人工智能服务，旨在帮助各国实现国家发展优先事项。【原文：The United Arab Emirates said on Saturday it will invest $1 billion to expand AI infrastructure and AI-enabled services across Africa, with the aim of helping countries meet national development priorities.】

item.title: 文件显示，Wingtech 就荷兰有关 Nexperia 所有权的裁决提出上诉
item.description: 路透社看到的文件显示，中国半导体公司闻泰科技（Wingtech）已呼吁荷兰政府撤销对其荷兰计算机芯片子公司Nexperia的控制决定。【原文：Chinese semiconductor company Wingtech has appealed to the Dutch government to rescind its decision to take control of its Netherlands-based computer chip subsidiary Nexperia, documents seen by Reuters show.】

item.title: 美国政府从气候科学中撤出助推私人数据公司蓬勃发展
item.description: 英国一家房地产管理公司管理着 260 亿欧元（约合 299.3 亿美元）的资产，该公司担心其房地产面临洪水、火灾和其他与气候相关的风险，因此向伦敦一家数据分析公司 Climate X 寻求帮助。【原文：A British real estate manager overseeing 26 billion euros ($29.93 billion) in assets and concerned about flood, fire and other climate-related risks to its properties sought help from Climate X, a data analytics firm based in London.】

item.title: 美国 CFPB 与 MoneyLion 达成和解，执法活动逐渐减少
item.description: 美国消费者金融保护局（U.S. Consumer Financial Protection Bureau）与 MoneyLion 达成了一项 175 万美元的和解协议，以平息该在线贷款机构向军人收取过高贷款费用的指控，这可能是该机构在结束执法活动时采取的最后行动之一。【原文：The U.S. Consumer Financial Protection Bureau reached a $1.75 million settlement with MoneyLion to settle charges that the online lender overcharged military personnel on loans, in possibly one of the agency's final actions as it winds down enforcement activity.】

item.title: 据英国《金融时报》报道，比尔-阿克曼希望对冲基金潘兴在 2026 年初上市
item.description: 英国《金融时报》周五援引两位知情人士的话报道称，亿万富翁投资者比尔-阿克曼（Bill Ackman）正计划于明年初将对冲基金公司潘兴广场资本管理公司（Pershing Square Capital Management）公开上市。【原文：Billionaire investor Bill Ackman is aiming to publicly list hedge fund company, Pershing Square Capital Management, early next year, the Financial Times reported on Friday, citing two people briefed on the matter.】

item.title: 特朗普和马姆达尼称纽约公用事业公司康爱迪生需要降低费率
item.description: 美国总统唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）和纽约市当选市长佐赫兰-马姆达尼（Zohran Mamdani）周五一致认为，总部位于纽约的公用事业公司康爱迪生公司（Con Edison）需要降低费率。【原文：U.S. President Donald Trump and New York City Mayor-elect Zohran Mamdani agreed on Friday that New York-based utility Con Edison needed to lower its rates.】

item.title: 客户需求疲软 埃克森冻结大型制氢工厂计划
item.description: 埃克森美孚首席执行官达伦-伍兹（Darren Woods）周五在接受路透社采访时表示，由于客户需求疲软，埃克森美孚已暂停建设世界上最大的氢气生产设施之一的计划。【原文：Exxon Mobil has paused plans to build what would be one of the world's largest hydrogen production facilities due to weak customer demand, CEO Darren Woods told Reuters in an interview on Friday.】

item.title: 泰森食品公司将关闭美国牛肉工厂，原因是牛供应减少
item.description: 泰森食品公司（Tyson Foods）周五表示，该公司将关闭位于内布拉斯加州列克星敦（Lexington）的一家牛肉加工厂，该厂约有 3,200 名员工，因为美国牛的供应量降至近 75 年来的最低水平。【原文：Tyson Foods will close a beef plant in Lexington, Nebraska, with about 3,200 employees after U.S. cattle supplies dropped to their lowest level in nearly 75 years, the meatpacker said on Friday.】

item.title: 美国消费者局转向有限监督而非解散机构
item.description: 美国消费者金融保护局周五宣布，该局打算在 2026 年继续对金融机构进行有限度的监管，这表明代理局长拉塞尔-沃特（Russell Vought）之前承诺的彻底解散该机构的想法有所转变。【原文：The U.S. Consumer Financial Protection Bureau announced on Friday that it intends to continue supervising financial institutions on a limited basis in 2026, signaling a shift from acting Director Russell Vought’s previous pledge to completely dismantle the agency.】

item.title: 特朗普签署公告，放宽对部分焦炉加工厂的监管
item.description: 白宫表示，美国总统唐纳德-特朗普周五签署了一项公告，放宽对某些焦炉加工厂的监管要求。【原文：U.S. President Donald Trump signed a proclamation on Friday to ease regulatory requirements on certain coke oven processing plants, the White House said.】

item.title: BBC 董事会成员班纳吉在特朗普纪录片剪辑后辞职
item.description: 英国广播公司（BBC）董事会的一名独立董事舒梅特-班纳吉（Shumeet Banerji）已于周五辞职，原因是该公共广播公司称对唐纳德-特朗普总统演讲的编辑有误，并引发了 50 亿美元的诉讼威胁。【原文：An independent director on the BBC's board, Shumeet Banerji, has quit on Friday in the wake of what the public broadcaster said was an incorrect edit of a speech by President Donald Trump and which has prompted the threat of a $5 billion lawsuit.】

item.title: 消息人士称，白宫暂停执行旨在优先适用各州人工智能法律的行政命令
item.description: 消息人士周五透露，白宫已搁置了一项行政命令草案，该草案将通过诉讼和扣留联邦资金的方式，试图优先适用各州的人工智能法律。【原文：The White House has put on hold a draft executive order that would seek to preempt state laws on artificial intelligence through lawsuits and by withholding federal funds, sources said on Friday.】

item.title: 华纳兄弟 Discovery 的竞购者面临一系列政治和监管风险
item.description: 据路透社周四报道，派拉蒙、康卡斯特和 Netflix 正在竞购华纳兄弟 Discovery，但每家公司的竞购都面临着各自的政治和监管风险。【原文：Paramount Skydance , Comcast and Netflix are bidding to buy Warner Bros Discovery , Reuters reported on Thursday, but each company's bid faces its own political and regulatory risks.】

item.title: 最新铝供应商火灾后，福特重申年度息税前盈利指引
item.description: 本周铝供应商 Novelis 纽约工厂再次发生火灾后，福特汽车周五坚持其今年息税前盈利（EBIT）60 亿至 65 亿美元的年度指导目标。【原文：Ford Motor on Friday stood by its annual EBIT guidance of $6 billion to $6.5 billion for this year following another fire this week at aluminum supplier Novelis' New York plant.】

item.title: Glass Lewis 建议泰克资源公司投票支持与英美资源公司的交易
item.description: 独立代理咨询公司 Glass Lewis 周五建议泰克资源公司股东投票支持与英美资源集团（Anglo American）的合并交易。【原文：Independent proxy advisory firm Glass Lewis on Friday recommended Teck Resources shareholders to vote in favor of a deal to combine with Anglo American .】

item.title: 消息人士称美国考虑允许英伟达向中国出售 H200 芯片
item.description: 熟悉内情的人士称，特朗普政府正在考虑为向中国销售英伟达（Nvidia）的H200人工智能芯片开绿灯，因为双边缓和促进了美国先进技术对华出口的前景。【原文：The Trump administration is considering greenlighting sales of Nvidia's H200 artificial intelligence chips to China, people familiar with the matter said, as a bilateral detente boosts prospects for exports of advanced U.S. technology to China.】

item.title: 阿斯利康将投资 20 亿美元推动在美生产
item.description: 阿斯利康（AstraZeneca）周五表示，将投资 20 亿美元扩大其在马里兰州的生产基地，这是该公司此前宣布的到 2030 年在美国扩大生产和研究能力的 500 亿美元计划的一部分。【原文：AstraZeneca said on Friday it will invest $2 billion to expand its manufacturing footprint in Maryland as part of its previously announced $50 billion plan to expand manufacturing and research capabilities in the U.S. by 2030.】

item.title: 特朗普关税减免仍使 22% 的巴西货运受到影响
item.description: 巴西政府周五表示，在唐纳德-特朗普扩大豁免清单，将咖啡、肉类和水果等商品纳入其中后，巴西仍有 22% 的对美出口商品需缴纳 40% 的额外关税。【原文：Brazil's government said on Friday that 22% of its exports to the United States remain subject to a 40% extra tariff after Donald Trump expanded the list of exemptions to include goods such as coffee, meat and fruit.】

item.title: 部长称阿根廷未与银行讨论 200 亿美元救助计划
item.description: 阿根廷经济部长路易斯-卡普托（Luis Caputo）周五在社交媒体上发文称，阿根廷官员没有与美国银行就 200 亿美元的救援计划进行过交谈。【原文：Argentine officials did not speak with U.S. banks about a $20 billion rescue package, the country's economy minister, Luis Caputo, said on Friday in a post on social media.】

item.title: 育碧与腾讯达成价值 40 亿欧元的卓越工作室合作协议
item.description: 育碧周五表示，已完成腾讯对 Vantage Studios 的投资，该公司是围绕其《刺客信条》、《远征》和《汤姆-克兰西的彩虹六号》特许经营权而成立的新部门。【原文：Ubisoft said on Friday it has completed Tencent's investment in Vantage Studios, a new unit built around its Assassin's Creed, Far Cry and Tom Clancy's Rainbow Six franchises.】

item.title: SIX 集团权衡泛欧中小型企业交易所和收购事宜
item.description: 瑞士和西班牙股票市场的运营商正在权衡收购和为中小型公司推出泛欧股票交易所的事宜，其首席执行官告诉路透社。【原文：The operator of the Swiss and Spanish stock markets is weighing acquisitions and the launch of a pan-European equity exchange for small and medium-sized firms, its chief executive told Reuters.】
